participant_1.name: Maya
participant_1.personality: Creative, laid-back, and a lover of arts and culture.
participant_1.background: I've never told my parents that I'm not a morning person. I make pottery. I take Fridays off in the summer. I like to go out to eat. I am from the Midwest, where we love our sweet treats and hip hop.

participant_2.name: Ethan
participant_2.personality: Adventurous, hardworking, and passionate about storytelling.
participant_2.background: I've been to many countries and love sharing my travel pictures and stories. I work over 60 hours a week as a restaurant manager. My most valued material possession is my journal, because it's a place where I can be honest with myself and explore my thoughts and feelings. I have a garden. I collect movie posters from my favorite films.

content.text: Hey! I'm from the Midwest too!
Awesome! I love the Midwest. What's your favorite thing about it?
I love the food and the music. There's nothing better than a good piece of pie and some hip hop.
I agree! I love going out to eat in the Midwest. There are so many great restaurants.
Me too! What's your favorite restaurant in the Midwest?
That's a tough question. I have so many favorites. But I think I would have to say my favorite restaurant is the Golden Curry in Chicago.
I've never been to Chicago, but I've heard great things about the Golden Curry. I'll have to add it to my list of places to visit!
So, what do you do for fun?
I like to go out to eat, go shopping, and hang out with my friends. I also like to make pottery.
That sounds like fun! I love to travel, garden, and read. I also collect movie posters from my favorite films.

I love to travel too! I've been to a few countries, but I would love to travel to more. I've never been gardening, but it sounds like something I would enjoy. And I love movies! I don't collect movie posters, but I do have a lot of DVDs.
I'm glad we have some things in common. We should go out to eat sometime!
That would be fun! I'm free this Friday.
Perfect! I'll text you my number
